discharge_note:
Dear [Owner's Name],

Discharge Notes for Darth Vader

I'm thrilled to report that Darth Vader is doing significantly better since his last visit! During today's repeat consultation, we observed that his cough has stopped, and he's now running and playing with renewed energy. His appetite has also improved, and he's eating without any issues. Overall, Darth Vader seems more lively and energetic, which is wonderful to see!

Today's consultation involved a thorough examination and assessment of his current condition. We're pleased with his progress, and no further treatment or medication was necessary at this time.

To ensure Darth Vader continues to thrive, please follow these important instructions:

* Continue to monitor his appetite, energy level, and overall behavior. If you notice any signs of illness or discomfort, please don't hesitate to contact us.
* Maintain his regular feeding schedule and provide plenty of fresh water at all times.
* Encourage gentle play and exercise to help him maintain his current level of fitness.

We're always here to support you and Darth Vader. If you have any concerns or questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. We're looking forward to his continued progress and can't wait to see him at his next check-up!

Best regards,

[Your Name]
Veterinary Assistant
